answers.answer: Thats great you are ready to quit! I remember when I made the decision to quit and I am now 61 days clean. A much better feeling than taking those pills. Immoduim is something I would highly recommend!!! Good luck to you and I wish you the best!!! The withdrawls don't last toooo long!!!

Vicodin shouldnt be too Overwhelming to come off. Ive taken Vicodin for a couple years here and there. Months on and off. For me though, ive never really had an addictive nature - but Vicodin only seemed to work on me for the first week or So, then I really couldnt feel the effects enough after that to appreciate the Need for more.Anti-Depressants probably work quite a bit , atleast for the Depression and Irritability. Im almost positive after 2 weeks you should be feeling back to your old self again. The first couple days maybe even week may be sucky - but I wouldnt think Life altering.I personally hate the idea of having to mask one addiction with another potential hazard, but I would think a Good stiff Drink or an Excederin PM when you really begin to have a craving, then just go to sleep. But to each thier own, you'll find your way to stop. GL
Since you have some other medical issues i would really talk with either your doctor or the pharmacist about what you can and cant take.  Better to be safe.        sara

question: I am new to the forum and have been reading posted comments all night.  I think I have a solid plan for my "final day".  I am however a little confused on when to start taking the vitamins and supplements.  I have been taking 8-10 7.5 vicodins for over a year for back pain.  I can't go on like this anymore - I QUIT!!!  I am retired so I have no fears about returning to work.  I have informed my family and a few friends so I have their support. I am concerned of course about the wds but I think it is a small price to pay for a clear mind and energy.  So if someone could please advise me on what and when I should start the vitamins and supplements I would truly appreciate it.  I am being treated for high blood pressure and diabetes so I need to be careful when taking any herbal supplements...thank you
title: Vicodin Detox
